trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Iala Jul has a request for a child of man.
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_TODO_00<tab>Defeat either a rabbit's tail, a tot aevis, or a phooka.
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_001<tab>Well, that a child of man should appear at this moment! This little one is fortunate indeed.

TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_002<tab>I have the honor of watching over the life forming within this egg. It will be a happy day when it finally comes out into the world. Alas, it is not like to grow up knowing men, and that thought saddens me.
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_003<tab>But I have an idea. If you can spare the time, will you not bring me something warm with which to line yonder nest?
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_004<tab>The fleece of a rabbit's tail, the feathers of a tot aevis, or the pelt of a phooka─any one of these shall serve.
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_005<tab>Please, bring me either the fleece of a rabbit's tail, the feathers of a tot aevis, or the pelt of a phooka. I will use it to line yonder nest.
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_020<tab>Welcome back. So, what did you bring?
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_021<tab>Ah, the fleece of a rabbit's tail. While it is no secret whence it derives its name, the creature is shrouded in mystery thick as its fleece.
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_022<tab>Ah, the feathers of a tot aevis. While the creature's appearance cannot be said to be pleasant, its feathers provide unrivaled warmth.
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_023<tab>Ah, the pelt of a phooka. You have done well to obtain this. When I gaze into the creature's eyes, I feel as though I am gazing into madness.

TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_024<tab>Thank you, this shall make an excellent lining for the nest. And when the little one is born, I will be certain to tell it the tale of your visit and your gift.
TEXT_LUCKZD017_03424_EGGAMARO03424_000_025<tab>It will bring it great joy to have a connection to a child of man, this I know. Please accept this by way of gratitude.
